remark.p: Foreign Service Officer. Permanent Representative of the U.S.A. to the Organization of American States (Washington); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (Uruguay); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Uruguay); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Panama); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (Ecuador); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (Colombia).
